name: Gruesome Slaughter

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Intimidating Prowess, Killing Flourish, Intimidate 11 ranks, slayer level 11th.

sections.text: Creatures you demoralize by using the Killing Flourish feat must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + the higher of your Strength or Dexterity modifier) or become sickened for 1 minute.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You can inspire extreme revulsion when you slaughter your enemies.
